name: 陳柔妃
objective:
針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.
